about_the_game:
League Heroes use changshuang's fighting and matchmaker's style to create a different action game for players. The cool fighting scene brings different feelings in matchmaker's game. Various skills are released alternately. Coupled with changshuang's striking feeling, players can quickly indulge in this game!



This game is the biggest combination of RPG and action and shooting games. You will be brought to an adventure world full of swords, archers, guns, fire and bullets. Like other fighting games, you have to face many monsters and powerful opponents, but more than that, you have the opportunity to show your gunner skills like playing gunner. Now you can experience this game anywhere and at any time without caring about the network. Are you ready to be the most powerful player in the battle game?



[game content]

▶ battle



When the battle begins, every Ninja has to deal with dangerous monsters that are constantly attacking. Whenever you want to kill them, you can use the button at the bottom right to kill or avoid being killed. It's a very difficult and crazy battle, but if you can use a variety of skills, you can make your characters stronger. Try not to be hit by the monster and its magic



▶ Design and modeling



You will be surprised by the shape and music effect of the game. As a hero, to create a crazy, powerful magic burning dark world. In addition, there is a slow action at the end of each level that surprises you. Use intelligence to control the battle and make it work best.



▶ Payment for different upgrades



In RPG Games, you can use various upgrades. Some monsters are very dangerous, so you have to use more powerful weapons than what you just started. In RPG, upgrading attack power, armor, physical strength and critical strike will make each level better and better.



▶ Unlimited projects



There are many different characters in the game, so in the process of dealing with the enemy, your level, attack ability, defense ability and physical strength are very important. You can upgrade or buy more gems, endurance, gold... Various unique skills will help them increase their strength many times and destroy the enemy at a glance in each battle. In each legend, these warriors can also use special abilities and weapons to destroy monsters, such as swords, archery...



▶ Global ranking



There are many rankings that make these games more and more interesting and attractive. Bring your game warrior to the top in every battle with your wisdom and skills. Become friends in Ninja games with all over the world, and then compete with your friends for ninja.
